short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to search for EU Grants and Tenders from browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gives you direct access to the Horizon Europe funding, information, and support pages. It is designed to allow easier access and enhanced functionality for searching for Horizon Europe Grants and Tenders.
The advanced search function and multiple filters allow you to quickly track down a suitable funding stream for your Horizon Europe research project.
The advanced search can also be used to search for other EU funding areas you may be interested in.
